items.content_html: small-i18n is a lightweight internationalization package that offers a simple and efficient way to manage translations in your project. It allows you to translate text using keys, without the additional overhead and complexity found in full-fledged i18n libraries.

items.content_html: TokenForge is a lightweight and flexible JWT utility library for Node.js, designed to simplify token creation, verification, and decoding. With built-in support for custom claims, expiry validation, and secure token handling, TokenForge ensures streamlined and secure authentication for your applications.
items.title: saicharan-Devcoder/AuthUtils: TokenForge is a lightweight and flexible JWT utility library for Node.js, designed to simplify token creation, verification, and decoding. With built-in support for custom claims, expiry validation, and secure token handling, TokenForge ensures streamlined and secure authentication for your applications.

items.content_html: Interactive Terminal Portfolio An interactive, terminal-style portfolio designed for showcasing experience and skills tailored for DevOps and SRE roles. This project replicates a lightweight Linux terminal interface, allowing recruiters to engage with your resume dynamically using real terminal-like commands.

This project replicates a lightweight Linux terminal interface, allowing recruiters to engage with your resume dynamically using real terminal-like commands.
